Interface Logger

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LoggerGestor, LoggerJogo, LoggerSimples

    public interface Logger
extends java.io.Serializable
    Representa um logger que guarda registos em formato de texto
